name: @hrefcl/apidoc
description: APIDoc v5 - RESTful web API Documentation Generator with Vue 3 and modern features
author: Href Spa <hola@apidoc.app>

scripts.build: npm run build:css && tsc && npm run build:copy-core
scripts.build:copy-core: cp core/*.js dist/core/ 2>/dev/null && cp -r core/errors core/filters core/languages core/parsers core/utils core/workers dist/core/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build:clean: rm -rf dist && npm run build:css && npm run build
scripts.build:template: cd apps/apidoc-template-v5 && npm run build && cd ../.. && cp -r apps/apidoc-template-v5/dist/index.html template
scripts.build:all: npm run build:clean && npm run build:template
scripts.example:01: ./bin/apidoc generate -i examples/01-basic-api/src/ -o tmp/01-basic-api && npx serve tmp/01-basic-api -p 8080
scripts.example:02: ./bin/apidoc generate -i examples/02-openapi/src/ -o tmp/02-openapi && npx serve tmp/02-openapi -p 8080
scripts.example:03: ./bin/apidoc generate -i examples/03-models/src/ -o tmp/03-models && npx serve tmp/03-models -p 8080
scripts.example:04: ./bin/apidoc generate -i examples/04-mqtt/src/ -o tmp/04-mqtt && npx serve tmp/04-mqtt -p 8080
scripts.example:05: ./bin/apidoc generate -i examples/05-i18n/src/ -o tmp/05-i18n && npx serve tmp/05-i18n -p 8080
scripts.example:06: ./bin/apidoc generate -i examples/06-versioning/src/ -o tmp/06-versioning && npx serve tmp/06-versioning -p 8080
scripts.example:07: ./bin/apidoc generate -i examples/07-authentication/src/ -o tmp/07-authentication && npx serve tmp/07-authentication -p 8080
scripts.example:08: ./bin/apidoc generate -i examples/08-apiSchema/src/ -o tmp/08-apiSchema && npx serve tmp/08-apiSchema -p 8080
scripts.example:09: ./bin/apidoc generate -i examples/09-code/src/ -o tmp/09-code && npx serve tmp/09-code -p 8080
scripts.example:10: ./bin/apidoc generate -c examples/10-markdown/apidoc.json -o tmp/10-markdown && npx serve tmp/10-markdown -p 8080
scripts.example:11: ./bin/apidoc generate -i examples/11-multi-language/src/ -o tmp/11-multi-language && npx serve tmp/11-multi-language -p 8080
scripts.example:12: ./bin/apidoc generate -c examples/12-tsdoc/apidoc.json -o tmp/12-tsdoc && npx serve tmp/12-tsdoc -p 8080
scripts.example:all: ./bin/apidoc generate -c examples/apidoc.json -o tmp/all && npx serve tmp/all -p 8080
scripts.test: mocha --colors --no-package --no-config 'test/**/*_test.*js' 2>/dev/null || echo '⚠️  No Mocha tests found'
scripts.test:lint: npm run typecheck && npm run eslint
scripts.pre-commit: npm run typecheck && npm run eslint && npm run test
scripts.docs:serve: npm run docs && npx serve docs/api -p 3001
